title: To the P-I Generalis. De Causa Marianae de Jesus Paredes.
creator: Puyol, Antonio
description: Polemics with Salazar for the use of the right to collect 1000 ps that Bonilla left to the faith of Mariana de Jesus. He sends information about two new miracles by Mariana. He remembers his solicitude for extended powers to offer the mass outside the church. Criticism to the Equatorian agent in Rome for his sinful behaviour. He mencions the movement of Bolivar's bones to Caracas
subject: bones
source: Nuova Compagnia, Assistentia Americae Latinae Meridionalis, Provincia Aequatoriana, I. Epistolae. Archivium Romanum Societatis Iesu, Rome, Italy.

title: To the P-I Generalis. De Causa Marianae de Jesus Paredes.
creator: Puyol, Antonio
description: He mentions the conflict of authority with Salazar in relation to the administration of the Pious work of Mariana de Jesus. He asks once again the censorship for any other form of collection. About the circulation of stamps of the saint [brief transcription]. New criticism toward the bishop of Cuenca, Torres.
subject: engravings
source: Nuova Compagnia, Assistentia Americae Latinae Meridionalis, Provincia Aequatoriana, I. Epistolae. Archivium Romanum Societatis Iesu, Rome, Italy.

title: To the P-I Generalis. De Causa Marianae de Jesus Paredes.
creator: Puyol, Antonio
description: About the 1000 pesos, the recollection in Guayaquil, and the project of establishing Mission in Ecuador as a trap. He mentions the state of political affairs.
subject: print
source: Nuova Compagnia, Assistentia Americae Latinae Meridionalis, Provincia Aequatoriana, I. Epistolae. Archivium Romanum Societatis Iesu, Rome, Italy.

title: To Ignazio Maria Lerdo, Assitant Father of Spain.
creator: Blas, Pablo
description: He informs about their travel from New Granada to Quito and the connections with Peru and Ecuador.
subject: flowers, fruits, vegetables
source: Nuova Compagnia, Assistentia Americae Latinae Meridionalis, Provincia Aequatoriana, I. Epistolae. Archivium Romanum Societatis Iesu, Rome, Italy.

title: To the P-I Generalis, Joan Rooathan.
creator: Orejuela, Manuel
description: He sends a bone of Mariana de Jesus
subject: bones
source: Nuova Compagnia, Assistentia Americae Latinae Meridionalis, Provincia Aequatoriana, I. Epistolae. Archivium Romanum Societatis Iesu, Rome, Italy.

title: To the P-I Generalis, Joan Rooathan. De Causa Marianae de Jesus Paredes.
creator: Blas, Pablo
description: The backs up Orejuela's letter. Puyol as "estrafalario" alcoholic and who writes to everyone. He also mentions the importance of founding a Congragation for the cult of Mariana de Jesus. Also the shipping of one bone of Mariana de Jesus and the readership of bad books. Mission in Ibarra and edication of students.
subject: bones; books; pasquinade
source: Nuova Compagnia, Assistentia Americae Latinae Meridionalis, Provincia Aequatoriana, I. Epistolae. Archivium Romanum Societatis Iesu, Rome, Italy.

title: Ferdinando Lorenzana transcribes a letter from Manuel Maria Mosquera
creator: Mosquera, Manuel Mar√≠a
description: Ferdinando Lorenzana transcribes a letter from MMM about the restoration of the Company of Jesus in New Granada and his commission to make the decree to come to fruition.
subject: print
